mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COIN (COIN_ID, CREATOR_ID, CURRENT_PRICE, CLOSING_PRICE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{coinId}, #{creatorId}, #{currentPrice}, #{closingPrice}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT c.COIN_ID AS COIN_ID, c.CURRENT_PRICE AS CURRENT_PRICE, c.CLOSING_PRICE AS CLOSING_PRICE, u.USERNAME AS CREATOR_USERNAME FROM COIN c JOIN USER u ON c.CREATOR_ID = u.USER_ID

SELECT c.COIN_ID AS COIN_ID, c.CREATOR_ID AS CREATOR_ID, c.CURRENT_PRICE AS CURRENT_PRICE, (c.CURRENT_PRICE - c.CLOSING_PRICE) AS CHANGE_PRICE, ((c.CURRENT_PRICE - c.CLOSING_PRICE) / c.CLOSING_PRICE * 100) AS FLUCTUATION_RATE, u.NAME AS CREATOR_NAME, u.USERNAME AS CREATOR_USERNAME, u.IMAGE AS CREATOR_IMAGE, p.POSITION AS PROFILE_POSITION, p.BIO AS PROFILE_BIO FROM COIN c JOIN USER u ON c.CREATOR_ID = u.USER_ID JOIN PROFILE p ON u.USER_ID = p.USER_ID
